00015 namespace {
00016   // Declare RL Glue variables.
00017   observation_t current_observation;
00018   reward_observation_terminal_t ro;
00019   
00020   // Declare Taxi helper functions and types.
00021   enum taxi_action_t {NORTH, SOUTH, EAST, WEST, PICKUP, PUTDOWN};
00022   typedef std::pair<double,double> coord_t;
00023   
00024   // Declare Taxi configuration variables.
00025   const bool nonMarkov = false;
00026   const bool noisy = false;
00027   Random rng;
00028   const Gridworld *grid = NULL;
00029   std::vector<coord_t> landmarks;
00030 
00031   // Declare Taxi state variables.
00032   int ns, ew, pass, dest;
00033   bool fickle = false;
00034 }

00040   
00041 const char *env_init()
00042 {
00043   grid = create_default_map();
00044   landmarks.push_back(coord_t(4.,0.));
00045   landmarks.push_back(coord_t(0.,3.));
00046   landmarks.push_back(coord_t(4.,4.));
00047   landmarks.push_back(coord_t(0.,0.));
00048 
00049   // Handle RL Glue stuff.
00050   allocateRLStruct(&current_observation, 4, 0, 0);
00051   std::fill(current_observation.intArray,
00052             current_observation.intArray + current_observation.numInts,
00053             0);
00054   ro.observation = &current_observation;
00055   ro.terminal = 0;
00056   ro.reward = 0.0;      
00057 
00058   std::stringstream response;
00059   response << "VERSION RL-Glue-3.0 PROBLEMTYPE episodic DISCOUNTFACTOR 1 ";
00060   response << "OBSERVATIONS INTS (3 0 4) (0 3) ";
00061   response << "ACTIONS INTS (0 5) ";
00062   response << "REWARDS (-10 20) ";
00063   response << "EXTRA Taxi implemented by Nicholas K. Jong.";
00064   static std::string buffer;
00065   buffer = response.str();
00066   return buffer.c_str();
00067 }
00068 
00069 void env_cleanup()
00070 {
00071   clearRLStruct(&current_observation);
00072 
00073   delete grid;
00074   grid = NULL;
00075   landmarks.clear();
00076 }
00077 
00078 const observation_t *env_start()
00079 {
00080   ns = rng.uniformDiscrete(1, grid->height()) - 1;
00081   ew = rng.uniformDiscrete(1, grid->width()) - 1;
00082   pass = rng.uniformDiscrete(1, landmarks.size()) - 1;
00083   do dest = rng.uniformDiscrete(1, landmarks.size()) - 1;
00084   while (dest == pass);
00085   fickle = false;
00086 
00087   current_observation.intArray[0] = ns;
00088   current_observation.intArray[1] = ew;
00089   current_observation.intArray[2] = pass;
00090   current_observation.intArray[3] = dest;
00091   ro.reward = 0.0;
00092   ro.terminal = 0;
00093 
00094 //   std::cout << ns << " " << ew << " " << pass << " " << dest << "\n";
00095 
00096   return &current_observation;
00097 }
00098 
00099 const reward_observation_terminal_t *env_step(const action_t *a)
00100 {       
00101   ro.reward = apply(a->intArray[0]);
00102   ro.terminal = (pass == dest) ? 1 : 0;
00103 
00104   current_observation.intArray[0] = ns;
00105   current_observation.intArray[1] = ew;
00106   current_observation.intArray[2] = pass;
00107   current_observation.intArray[3] = dest;
00108 
00109   //std::cout << a->intArray[0] << " -> " 
00110   //<< ns << " " << ew << " " << pass << " " << dest << "\n";
00111   
00112   return &ro;
00113 }   
00114 
00115 const char* env_message(const char* _inMessage) {
00116   std::stringstream response;
00117   std::stringstream message(_inMessage);
00118 
00119   // Tokenize the message
00120   std::istream_iterator<std::string> it(message);
00121   std::istream_iterator<std::string> end;
00122   
00123   while (it != end) {
00124     std::string command(*it++);
00125     if (command.compare("set-random-seed") == 0) {
00126       if (it == end) {
00127         response << "Taxi received set-random-seed with no argument.\n";
00128       } else {
00129         std::string seed_string(*it++);
00130         int seed = atoi(seed_string.c_str());
00131         rng.reset(seed);
00132         response << "Taxi set random seed to " << seed << ".\n";
00133       }
00134     } else {
00135       response << "Taxi did not understand '" << command << "'.\n";
00136     }
00137   }
00138 
00139   static std::string buffer;
00140   buffer = response.str();
00141   return buffer.c_str();
00142 }

00144 const Gridworld *create_default_map() {
00145   std::vector<std::vector<bool> > nsv(5, std::vector<bool>(4,false));
00146   std::vector<std::vector<bool> > ewv(5, std::vector<bool>(4,false));
00147   ewv[0][0] = true;
00148   ewv[0][2] = true;
00149   ewv[1][0] = true;
00150   ewv[1][2] = true;
00151   ewv[3][1] = true;
00152   ewv[4][1] = true;
00153   return new Gridworld(5,5,nsv,ewv);
00154 }
00155 
00156 int add_noise(int action) {
00157   switch(action) {
00158   case NORTH:
00159   case SOUTH:
00160     return rng.bernoulli(0.8) ? action : (rng.bernoulli(0.5) ? EAST : WEST);
00161   case EAST:
00162   case WEST:
00163     return rng.bernoulli(0.8) ? action : (rng.bernoulli(0.5) ? NORTH : SOUTH);
00164   default:
00165     return action;
00166   }
00167 }
00168 
00169 void apply_fickle_passenger() {
00170   if (fickle) {
00171     fickle = false;
00172     if (rng.bernoulli(0.3)) {
00173       dest += rng.uniformDiscrete(1, landmarks.size() - 1);
00174       dest = dest % landmarks.size();
00175     }
00176   }
00177 }
00178 
00179 double apply(int action) {
00180   const int effect = noisy ? add_noise(action) : action;
00181   switch(effect) {
00182   case NORTH:
00183     if (!grid->wall(static_cast<unsigned>(ns),
00184                     static_cast<unsigned>(ew),
00185                     effect))
00186       {
00187         ++ns;
00188         apply_fickle_passenger();
00189       }
00190     return -1;
00191   case SOUTH:
00192     if (!grid->wall(static_cast<unsigned>(ns),
00193                     static_cast<unsigned>(ew),
00194                     effect))
00195       {
00196         --ns;
00197         apply_fickle_passenger();
00198       }
00199     return -1;
00200   case EAST:
00201     if (!grid->wall(static_cast<unsigned>(ns),
00202                     static_cast<unsigned>(ew),
00203                     effect))
00204       {
00205         ++ew;
00206         apply_fickle_passenger();
00207       }
00208     return -1;
00209   case WEST:
00210     if (!grid->wall(static_cast<unsigned>(ns),
00211                     static_cast<unsigned>(ew),
00212                     effect))
00213       {
00214         --ew;
00215         apply_fickle_passenger();
00216       }
00217     return -1;
00218   case PICKUP: {
00219     if (pass < static_cast<int>(landmarks.size())
00220         && coord_t(ns,ew) == landmarks[static_cast<unsigned>(pass)])
00221       {
00222         pass = landmarks.size();
00223         fickle = nonMarkov && noisy;
00224         return -1;
00225       } else
00226         return -10;
00227   }
00228   case PUTDOWN:
00229     if (pass == static_cast<int>(landmarks.size())
00230         && coord_t(ns,ew) == landmarks[static_cast<unsigned>(dest)]) {
00231       pass = dest;
00232       return 20;
00233     } else
00234       return -10;
00235   }
00236   std::cerr << "Unreachable point reached in Taxi::apply!!!\n";
00237   return 0; // unreachable, I hope
00238 }
